text: The Beach is a 2000 American British adventure drama movie directed by Danny Boyle and was based on the 1996 novel of the same name by Alex Garland. It stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Tilda Swinton, Virginie Ledoyen, Robert Carlyle, Paterson Joseph, Peter Youngblood Hills, Zelda Tinska and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2000 drama movies Category:2000 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Danny Boyle Category:Movies set on beaches Category:Movies set in Thailand
title: The Beach (movie)
